channel.title: Christmas on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Christmas on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Is it Christmas?
item.description: From the authoritative source for such questions, https://isitchristmas.com/. YES Your answer may vary depending on the day and time that you read this.

item.title: Countdown clocks: Only (nn) days until Christmas
item.description: There was a brief interlude after Halloween to allow for Election Season, but then all of the orange-themed holiday items were swept away from the stores and are now replaced by green and red themed holiday items.  (New packaging, same stuff.)  That was what it looked like both at Kroger and at Caribou Coffee yesterday, quite disconcerting to go with the 60+ degree weather. Kroger had a large clock up in view of the checkout lanes with a countdown timer until Christmas, something like this one (except a lot cheaper).
